item.description:
We are currently working on a series of steps aimed at developing Trade Rules and Trading Plans. Our "agenda" is an informal one that primarily consists of the following:


  • Members and guests sign in.
  • Informal discussion while respondents arrive. This may be centered around almost any related topic such as a review of some given stock chart, various indicators and their usefulness, or perhaps a trade someone has either made or might be considering.
  • Presentation and interactive discussion. Questions are always encouraged during the presentation.
  • Adjournment


We are NOT an investment club where members contribute to a pool and mutually select investment issues.
We ARE individual traders, each with their own style and approach (some of us trade for a living) who get together to share ideas and strategies.
Anyone is welcome to join us, and yes - even the most uninformed novices. Our members are a good group of people and more than willing to mentor anyone so inclined as to put up with us.

We discuss issues from fundamental and technical analysis to books on trading, from candlestick patterns to various "trader friendly" web sites, and from price indicators to trading strategies.

Why not join us for a meeting or two? It doesn't cost anything, it may be just what you're looking for, and who knows... maybe you'll even learn something useful right away!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one manning the laptop & projector.
item.why: We cover a wide range of material from the very basics on up. Our goal is to become better traders through information sharing, discussing issues from different perspectives, and mentoring one another.

group.name: The Charlestown Investor's Business Daily Forum

item.name: Trade Rules & Trading Plans (cont'd)
